Address: 3475 VICTORY BLVD, STATEN ISLAND, New York, 10314, United States of America
CompanyDescription: Products and Operations. We are an integrated wholesale coffee roaster and dealer in the United States. Our core products can be divided into three categories: ? Wholesale Green Coffee: unroasted raw beans imported from around the world and sold to large and small roasters and coffee shop operators; ? Private Label Coffee: coffee roasted, blended, packaged and sold under the specifications and names of others, including supermarkets that want to have their own brand name on coffee to compete with national brands; and ? Branded Coffee: coffee roasted and blended to our own specifications and packaged and sold under our eight proprietary and licensed brand names in different segments of the market.  ... More ...
